item.title: CVE-2023-5079|2024-08-02T07:44:53.676Z -- lenovo -- lecloud%20application
item.description: Lenovo LeCloud App improper input validation allows attackers to access arbitrary components and arbitrary file downloads, which could result in information disclosure.
